meanings.definition: The characteristic style or mannerisms of a pianist.
meanings.sent1: Her pianisms were evident in the way she delicately touched the keys.
meanings.sent2: The pianisms of the famous pianist were admired by many.
meanings.sent3: His unique pianisms always made the audience smile.
meanings.sent4: The pianisms of the young prodigy were like a musical signature.
meanings.sent5: The pianisms of the pianist painted a vivid picture of his emotions.

meanings.definition: The techniques or skills associated with playing the piano.
meanings.sent1: Learning pianisms takes dedication and practice.
meanings.sent2: His pianisms improved greatly after taking lessons from a professional.
meanings.sent3: She mastered the pianisms with ease, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: The intricate pianisms of the piece required precision and focus.
meanings.sent5: His pianisms on the piano were like a dance of fingers on the keys.
